website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward and reliable charging station.
pros: If you're just looking for a functional charger that holds up to four Joy-Cons, this is a great option
The acrylic lights change from red to green when the Joy-Cons are fully charged, which takes about 3 hours
cons: Lights remain on even when this station isn't charging

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated, very bright if you look from above, depending where you put it it may be too bright for you, in my case I'm totally okay with it. As long as it's plugged it will be lit green.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good little charger
customer_reviews.text: This charging dock is smaller than you'd expect. That's not a bad thing. It doesn't take up a lot of desktop real estate. It charges the Joy-Cons quickly. The LEDS are a nice touch, green at rest and red while charging. The only negative, and it's not a big deal, is that the LEDs are pretty bright. It'd be nice it their intensity was toned down a little. Other than that, this is a nice little unit and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Gene

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product so much that I decided to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I got one last year shortly after getting my switch. I loved this product so much that I decided to get another ^^ i would recommend who has a joycon collection they'd like to display in an elegant while while easily charging.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: So far best dock I've found
customer_reviews.text: Fats shipping, was packaged perfectly. I really like this charging dock for joy-con it's very small like same size of joy-cons. The Led lights are very bright and easy to tell if there charged or not. Highly recommend for kids with Switch or for advad gammer that isn't looking to have a joy-con die on them. I even gave away my more bulky joy-con charging dock because this one I was more sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Clad Vesto

customer_reviews.title: Joy-Con Charging dock
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work very well, plus the lights add a certain something to the game room. Just a heads up this will light up green even when no controllers are attached.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi A. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Great recharger for our new Switch controllers
customer_reviews.text: This recharger is so simple it just works. You slide each controller vertically down into their seated positions and they charge. Simple! When a battery needs charging the light changes to red. When completed the light changes to green. My only reason for docking one star is that the green light stays on whether a controller is left in the recharger or removed. It's always glowing green, which is a tad bit annoying in a darkened room for watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Well worth getting....
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! I bought this as an after-thought for my grand daughter since I had picked up additional controllers... Not only is it compact, it is highly functional... As soon as you plug it in, it lights up green and looks really cool... Once you place a controller to charge, that one turns red until it is fully charged... My grand daughter loves the lights and is really happy with this... Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Carl Cook

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and an attractive addition to the Nintendo Switch. When you have multiple controllers it also makes it easier to charge them, so you no longer have to wait for one set to be finished. It's small enough that if you choose to you can put it "out of the way" and it can be plugged into the Switch itself, or into a wall charger.
customer_reviews.author: amvs

customer_reviews.title: Cool Light-Charging Well-Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This Joy-Con Charging Dock KINGTOP has been working well. The charging indicator Red/Green Lights look very cool. Just plug directly into the USB port on the back of Nintendo-Switch for charging. Do not need additional charger. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BE FLEXIBLE

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This dock does a great job of charging up to four joy-cons quickly in a small amount of space. The only reason I’m only giving it three stars is that there is no way to turn off the super bright lights. It glows red when the controllers are charging and green when they are fully charged. It is incredibly bright and we end up unplugging it as soon as the controllers are charged most of the time because the lights are annoying.
customer_reviews.author: MR29

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it works great at charging 4 joy cons at once
customer_reviews.text: Soo I do like this charger a lot. it is lightweight and easy to move around and take with me. The usb cord that it comes with to charge the entire thing plugs right into the side of the switch. Green light.. ready, Red light.. not charged. easy enough and now my boyfriend and his teenage daughter and myself can all play at the same time without having to pass a joycon around to share because 2 are dying. I would recommend. Charging isn't the fastest but if you just plug them in when you aren't using them, you should have fully charged controllers when you come back.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Must have for joycons
customer_reviews.text: This is great for your extra joycons! I took this to my moms house to play with my brothers and realized my two joycons werent charged so after that i bought this to always have all my joycons charged and the cool light makes it look nice and function well to tell you when charged or low on battery/charging
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. It does stay on even when it doesn't have joycons cradled into it, so I guess that could be an annoyance if you sleep in the same room as the switch. Unit lights up green when joycons are fully charged, red while still charging. The joycons themselves slot onto this unit so make sure you're docking them properly. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly a great buy. Worth it and more.
customer_reviews.text: Pic gives no justice or box. Didnt have high expectations for it because the price but boy was i wrong! Seriously the lights are so bright. The base is sturdy for being light. Doesnt knock over easy and super easy to put the controllers on it. So glad i bought it. Would buy again but i doubt i will need to.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Thomas

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: great product, haven't had any problems so far and I hope none in the future. At first I thought one of the charging station was defective because all the lights turn green except for the right back after an hour it turns green. Besides that I looks great in my new place
customer_reviews.author: RaSeru

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boys as a Christmas present, so it wasn't used before Christmas. Here we are, less than a month later and one of the charging ports for the joy-cons does not work, all 3 others work, but not the back left one. I would watch out for this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little charging dock
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few weeks ago and so far its doing exactly what I need it to. Colored LED's are nice and bright and let me know if any of the joy cons are still charging. Since it only engages the bottom inch or so of the controller, the track it sits in is shorter and makes it easier to slide it in and out. Its essentially the same form factor as the OEM Nintendo PowerA dock without me having to pay Nintendo the $30.00 they wanted for it at Christmas. Switch is pretty cool but there is nothing about it that is inexpensive so I was looking for a good alternative. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas primiano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for JoyCons
customer_reviews.text: This charger looks wonderful and charges the joycons exactly as you would expect. A good buy. The four lights do stay on green when the joycon is fully charged, and never does turn off. That could be a turnoff for some.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Roth

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the item works, but the lights are waaaaay too bright
customer_reviews.text: received the product on time, but have not attempted to use the product. When I plugged it in, the LED lights are way to bright to be used in a family room. Per the previous reviews, I didn't realize how bright the green light was, and how it can't be turned off. As mentioned. I'm sure the product works fine, and would be a good accent piece to a game room. But as my family's switch in in our main TV space, the light is simply too distracting.
customer_reviews.author: BlackfootVT

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I agree with some of the other comments that it should turn off the LED when charging is complete but it's a minor point. It charges all 4 at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that works perfectly and charges my Joycons like it's supposed to. The lights are bright and it's easy to tell when the cons are charged, it's easy to plug and unplug the cons, and it's small so it sits neatly beside my Switch taking up little space.
customer_reviews.author: KingLT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger that's bit brighter than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has two docking stations. My wife and I both use the switch and this allows us to charge one or both after heavy use. The one drawback is how bright the led connection is. You can see it clearly from any part of the house within visual range. That's not always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ecostarr

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It works, I am happy with it... the lights are a great idea in theory but it's one of those things where the novelty will wear off and you'll unplug it quick if you put it in your bedroom or anywhere that you don't want a constant green or red light.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Edison

customer_reviews.title: Its Nice
customer_reviews.text: So I really loved this look and all, but you can't charge all 4 controllers at once if they all needed to be charged. It glitches the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I only received it a few days ago but so far I love it. Plugged right into the back of the switch dock, changes from green to red when I put the chargers on and back to green when they are fully charged. It's a bit odd trying to get it perfectly lined up since I'm use to slipping the whole controller onto the switch but not a star worth since I'm sure it'll be fine once I've used it a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good charger. As someone else said, the charging light does not turn off. If you have no controllers plugged in, the green light stays on which is a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Izen6

customer_reviews.title: Great little charger!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. A great charging station for controllers. Highly recommend the purchase. It plugs right into your Switch dock.
customer_reviews.author: Audralyniler

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and looks great. You could change up to 4 controllers at time. Great purchase and value.
customer_reviews.author: Ydelsi S. Santana N

customer_reviews.title: Lighting Charge
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Nintendo Switch Charging Dock Stand. I love the light indicators that’s lets you know immediately the controllers are Fully Charged. Arrived in Excellent Condition and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cleotonia

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased it so I cannot speak on durability but it is still working after a few days. It is easy to use and keeps the play area well organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie S

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and practical
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this! Charge relatively quick as well! The lights let you know when it's done charging which is also helpful! A must have for every switch owner with more than 2 joycons.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanny

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Effective Charger
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective, this charger plugs directly into the Switch base and charges our extra Joy-Cons. It is on all the time (as far as I can tell), so we unplug it when not in use. My kids recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Monster 65

customer_reviews.title: Great piece but bright.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to charge well (given at Christmas) - only deducted a star because it lights up the whole living room at night and have found it annoying from neighboring rooms. Wish there was a way to control the lights once the sticks are charged.
customer_reviews.author: JVarang

customer_reviews.title: Great exept for LEDs
customer_reviews.text: the charger itself is really good, but what i dont like is the LEDs. they are extremely bright. for me, all my switch stuff is in my bedroom, so i have to cover it with something if i want my joycons to charge through the night. if yours is in like a cabnet under your TV, you should be good to go, but if they are in the open, maybe find something else
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, LEDs are real bright
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to use. The indicator LEDs are REALLY bright. Too bright, really, but I have not yet used a marker or sticker to black out the top end of the glowy bits to tone it down. Otherwise, it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick, space-efficient charging!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son was looking for! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mona M

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and it works
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and it works. I like the small profile and the convenient lights to know when the joycons are charged.
customer_reviews.author: EricTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This little base works great to charge all the controllers at once. My only gripe is that the lights are brighter than I would like. However, this isnt a big deal. I would certainly recommend this little gizmo.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict:-)

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Lived that it’s a USB port so I can plug it in to pretty much anything! Mines connect right to my switch dock, easy to use and know when they’re done charging! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: jishs37

customer_reviews.title: awesome product, and priced right
customer_reviews.text: awesome product, and priced right. lights red when charging a solid green when fully charged. very good customer service. will definitely from again in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: John Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, the lights on the stand are a bit bright but nothing to moan and groan about. This does its job perfectly. And you can plug it straight only the Switch dock
customer_reviews.author: David Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great docking station (and an excellent night light too! Wow!)
customer_reviews.author: fd5

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, short cord
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! The only complaint that I have is the length of the cord supplied with the charging dock. I ended up buying a longer cable just so I could rest the dock on top of the table (the plug is on the wall right behind the table).
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great and light indicates charged. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and charges the remotes. Doesn't take up much space either
customer_reviews.author: JPOA

customer_reviews.title: I works, good price.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is meant to do. It charges my joy one and tells me when they are charged. Also the light on it is not obnoxiously bright as I thought it would be. Looking down on it it is bright but sitting back with it next to my TV it is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vreugdenhil

customer_reviews.title: Nice controller charging station
customer_reviews.text: This controller rocks. Not only does it charge 4 controllers at once, it also has a clear battery status inductor, green = charge complete, red = charging. Nice and easy that my 5 year old can do it, yes it is that simple. If I had 8 controllers I would buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d consider other options
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited for this. On paper looks like an easy way to charge my 4 joy cons. However, I’ve had the thing for 3 days and it is yet to charge a single joy con fully. At the most I have gotten 3 bars but I usually sit around 2 or even 1 charge bars on the controller. This is with all 4 charging for 24 hours plus. Tried to return the item and it is not eligible for return. If I could do it again I’d by something else to charge my joy cons.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great but light is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Works great, only thing is light stays on all the time
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it for long, but for the price it is definitely a steal, I can charge all 4 joy cons and the lighted pillars are useful to know when they are fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Meier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should would of gave it five stars if it came with a plug in power box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great dock. I have multiple sets of joy cons and it charges all of them. It's a little slower to charge compared to charging on the console. But perfect for the price
customer_reviews.author: A. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love that the lights indicate charged vs need charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the charger and little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely nice to have, but it is delicate and im always afraid my 5 year old might break it by putting the controller on it too hard. Otherwise, a great find
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The item does exactly what is designed to do. It was just as described. It is compact enough not to take up a lot of space but can charge multiple controllers at one. It plugs right into the Switch its self. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Thomas

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The charger is well designed and simple to use and plugs right into the back of your switch. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far, the LED indicators are cool, red indicates charging and green when its fully charged. The LED stays green eventhough no joycon on it, which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Irsan

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: The charger works nicely and the bright lights make it easy to see when charging is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great charging dock!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great very happy with it could not be a better deal for the money I like that it stays lit all the time and let you know Green is charged red they're charging and I also believe they said it's safe to leave it on the charging dock
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawksteve

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Our kids really like this charger. They really enjoy how the lights turn from red to green when the controllers are fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Good vibes only

customer_reviews.title: It is great all 4 chargers fit perfectly and it plus right ...
customer_reviews.text: We just opened it . It is for my daughter for easter. It is great all 4 chargers fit perfectly and it plus right into the docking station. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: KCS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far! Hope to put it to more consistent use in the near future.

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Even tho I returned it was a nice device. I ordered this buy mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised and the customer service is great they actually reached out to see if we were satisfied. it arrived on time and in perfect working order. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Damaso Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I Approve This Charger
customer_reviews.text: Got this a few months ago, still works Great! It's Just what I wanted! Would Recommend This Product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Edwards Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: Item says you can return if not satisfied. That is not the case. I am still jumping through hoops to get it returned
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Able to charge 4 controllers and the lights will change color to indicate charging and fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: P.T.

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent addition for my granddaughters Switch
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent addition for my granddaughters Switch. With 4 girls you need 4 controllers and you need them to all be charged at once.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy, an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: works well, i like the clear pillars on the charger to tell if they are charged or not works well
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Linn

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Works great, glad I went with this unit. It seems to be a very good design.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this charge, it glows a little bright but it's nice to know when they are ready.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I like that it has LEDs that indicate the charge status for each Joy-Con. Overall, it's a nice charging station.

customer_reviews.title: Got a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price! It was a gift so I don't know much about the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Dyck

customer_reviews.title: It charges.
customer_reviews.text: It charges 2 sets of joy cons in no time, clicks in easy and charges quick. The led lights are on bright and always on.

customer_reviews.title: It's cheaper and looks better than others.
customer_reviews.text: It works, it's informative cause of the lights, and the charging cord fits my galaxy s8 just another bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase, compact with cool green and red LED lights, my daughters love it

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worse than getting MarioKart all ready for 4 players and 2 of your Joycons need charged. Looks cool, love the lights, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: M. O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: It’s compact and l like the power light
customer_reviews.text: It’s compact and l like the power light. Extra bonus my son has it in his “game” room and it serves as a great night light.
customer_reviews.author: wolf8112

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Like that it charges all of my controllers at once, and it lights up green when fully charged :) Disliked that in the preview pic that I could dock a pro controller on product when in all actuality.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this charging station, it’s compact and works well with 4 Joycons. The only thing is if you are charging it in a room at night the light is really right. Otherwise it is great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it there is nothing more to say I just love it

customer_reviews.text: This charger is compact and works perfectly. I really like the lights that show the charge state so there is no question if the controllers are charged.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Holmgren

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger!
customer_reviews.text: Great charger! I had it for few weeks with no problems. The visible charging lights are great. They turn red when you put the controllers on them to charge, and when they're fully charged they turn green to let you know from across the room they're ready!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! nice to charge all 4 of our controllers at once

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!

customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. A good idea if you have multiple joy cons.

product_meta.title: Charging Dock Stand for Nintendo Switch KINGTOP Joy-Con Controllers Charger Station with Individual LEDs Indicator and Type C Charging Cable
feature_bullets: Joy-Con charging dock--Best solution for charging your Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Controllers and keeping track of them
Time-efficient charging--Fast Charges all 4 controllers in about 3.5 hours,never worry about your joycons not being charged,you’re always get ready to play
Clear Led Indicators--individual LEDs indicate the charge status for each Joy-Con. Red when charging and green when fully charged
Easy to use--simply slide the Joy-Con Controllers down and wait until each LED changes from red to green,powered via a Type C- USB charging cable(Included),also support original AC Adapter
KINGTOP Great Support with 2 Year Warranty,if you have any concerns with the Joy-Con charging dock on pre-sale or after-sale, Please feel free to contact us!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars472 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
